meta.name: description
meta.content: Mabton is located in the fertile Yakima Valley approximately 43 miles southeast of Yakima, Washington, and 45 miles west of the Tri-Cities. It is in the heart of the state’s hops, and grape-growing region.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Mabton School District, Mabton SD, Superintendent Joseph, Joey, Castilleja, Mabton WA.

section.class: content-container news1-container slick-container content-size-small orientation-horizontal thumbnail-orientation-vertical

div.div:
Following a directive from Washington State Governor Jay Inslee, all Mabton School District schools are closed beginning Monday, March 16 through Friday, April 24.
In addition to the resources posted on our website, Mabton School District educators and support staff are providing new grade-specific in-home learning materials on our resource school’s website. https://resources.msd120.org
Mabton School District wants to share its preparedness, prevention and information plans with students, staff, and families regarding 2019 Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19).
This restriction is in place due to concerns with the Coronavirus. Please read the memorandum for additional information.

h3.a: Washington State Department of Health - Water Lead Test Results

div.div:
Dear Mabton School Community:
In 2017, the Legislature directed the Washington State Department of Health to test for lead in drinking water in public schools in an effort to reduce children's overall exposure to lead in the environment. As part of our commitment to ensuring the health of our students and staff is protected, we recently participated in this program.

Cold weather means the possibility of a delayed start or closure of schools. Learn how to know when there's a delay or closure and how they affect classes and other activities in our schools. You may find closure or delay notifications on our website at https://www.msd120.org/closures/ or Facebook Page at https://www.facebook.com/MabtonSD
Please take the following survey if your a parent or guardian of an Artz-Fox student.
Please click on our "Employment Opportunities" Link below to view our most current job openings. Thank you for your interest!
Subscribe to our District Calendar for important school events and school activities.

section.class: content-container events1-container slick-container content-size-small orientation-horizontal date-orientation-horizontal

div.div: The Mabton Schools 2020 Levy is currently passing with a 60.47% "YES". This levy will help fund various programs in our schools and allow us to get an additional $3.88 million in Levy Equalization funds from the state! Check out the Levy 2020 page on our Mabton School District website to find out more information. Thank you Mabton!
Mabton made the cover of WSSDA Direct, a quarterly publication highlighting school Director work. Download the magazine here: https://www.wssda.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/2019-Winter-Direct.pdf

At WSSDA’s 2019 Annual Conference, Mabton, Riverside, and Clover Park School Districts have been named Boards of the Year in the categories of small, medium, and large school districts, respectively. Picked from among 34 Boards of Distinction, these boards were particularly successful at showing a correlation between data, board decisions, and positive outcomes for students.
